Translations.Text: tatha unhonne kaha jo hamase milane kee aasha nahin rakhateh hamapar farishte kyon nahin utaare gaye ya ham apane paalanahaar ko dekh lete? unhonne apane mein bada abhimaan kar liya hai tatha badee avagya[1] kee hai
jis din[1] ve farishton ko dekh lenge, us din koee shubh soochana nahin hogee aparaadhiyon ke lie tatha ve kahengeh[2] vanchit, vanchit hai
aur unake karmon[1] ko ham lekar dhool ke samaan uda denge
svarg ke adhikaaree, us din achchhe sthaan tatha sukhad shayanakaksh mein honge
jis din, chir jaayega aakaash baadal ke saath[1] aur farishte nirantar utaar diye jaayenge
us din, vaastavik raajy ati dayaavaan ka hoga aur kaafiron par ek kada din hoga
us din, atyaachaaree apane donon haath chabaayega, vah kahegaah kya hee achchha hota ki mainne rasool ka saath diya hota
haay mera durbhaagy! kaash mainne amuk ko mitr na banaaya hota
usane mujhe kupath kar diya shiksha (quraan) se, isake pashchaat ki mere paas aayee aur shaitaan manushy ko (samay par) dhokha dene vaala hai
tatha rasool[1] kahegaah he mere paalanahaar! meree jaati ne is quraan ko tyaag[2] diya
aur isee prakaar, hamane bana diya pratyek ka shatru, kuchh aparaadhiyon ko aur aapaka paalanahaar maargadarshan dene tatha sahaayata karane ko bahut hai

tatha kaafiron ne kahaah kyon nahin utaar diya gaya aapapar quraan poora ek hee baar[1]? isee prakaar, (isalie kiya gaya) taaki ham aapake dil ko drdhata pradaan karen aur hamane ise kramashah prastut kiya hai
(aur isalie bhee ki) ve aapake paas koee udaaharan laayen, to ham aapake paas saty le aayen aur uttam vyaakhya
jo apane mukhon ke bal, narak kee or ekatr kiye jaayenge, unheen ka sabase bura sthaan hai tatha sabase adhik kupath hain
tatha hamane hee moosa ko pustak (tauraat) pradaan kee aur usake saath usake bhaee haaroon ko sahaayak banaaya
phir hamane kahaah tum donon us jaati kee or jao, jisane hamaaree aayaton (nishaaniyon) ko jhuthala diya. antatah, hamane unhen dhvast-nirast kar diya

aur nooh kee jaati ne jab rasoolon ko jhuthalaaya, to hamane unhen dubo diya aur logon ke lie unhen shikshaaprad prateek bana diya tatha hamane[1] taiyaar kee hai, atyaachaariyon ke lie duhkhadaayee yaatana
tatha aad, samood, kuven vaalon tatha bahut-se samoodaayon ko, isake beech
aur pratyek ko hamane udaaharan diye tatha pratyek ko poornatah naash kar[1] diya
tatha ye[1] log us bastee[2] par aaye gaye hain, jinapar buree varsha kee gayee, to kya unhonne use nahin dekha? balki ye log punah jeevit hone ka vishvaas nahin rakhate
aur (he nabee!) jab ve aapako dekhate hain, to aapako upahaas bana lete hain (aur kahate hain) ki kya yahee hai, jise allaah ne rasool banaakar bheja hai
isane to hamen apane poojyon se kupath kar diya hota, yadi ham unapar adig na rahate aur ve sheeghr hee jaan lenge, jis samay yaatana dekhenge ki kaun adhik kupath hai
kya aapane use dekha, jisane apana poojy apanee abhilaasha ko bana liya hai, to kya aap usake sanrakshak[1] ho sakate hain
kya aap samajhate hain ki unamen se adhiktar sunate aur samajhate hain? ve pashuon ke samaan hain, balki unase bhee adhik kupath hain
kya aapane use nahin dekha ki aapake paalanahaar ne kaise chhaaya ko phaila diya aur yadi vah chaahata, to use sthir[1] bana deta, phir hamane soory ko usapar pramaan[2] bana diya
phir ham us (chhaaya ko) samet lete hain, apanee or dheere-dheere
aur vahee hai, jisane raatri ko tumhaare lie vastr[1] banaaya tatha nidra ko shaanti tatha din ko jaagane ka samay
tatha vahee hai, jisane vaayuyon ko bheja shubh soochana banaakar, apanee daya (varsha) se poorv tatha hamane aakaash se svachchh jal barasaaya
taaki jeevit kar den usake dvaara nirjeev nagar ko tatha use pilaayen unamen se, jinhen hamane paida kiya hai; bahut-se pashuon tatha maanav ko
tatha hamane vibhinn prakaar se ise varnan kar diya hai, taaki ve shiksha grahan karen. parantu, adhiktar logon ne asveekaar karate hue kufr grahan kar liya
aur yadi ham chaahate, to bhej dete pratyek bastee mein ek sachet karane[1] vaala
atah, aap kaafiron kee baat na maanen aur is (quraan ke) dvaara unase bhaaree jihaad (sangharsh)[1] karen
vahee hai, jisane mila diya do saagaron ko, ye meetha ruchikaar hai aur vo namakeen khaara aur usane bana diya donon ke beech ek parda[1] evan rok
tatha vahee hai, jisane paanee (veery) se manushy ko utpann kiya, phir usake vansh tatha sasuraal ke sambandh bana diye, aapaka paalanahaar ati saamarthyavaan hai
aur ve log ibaadat (vandana) karate hain allaah ke siva unakee, jo na unhen laabh pahuncha sakate hain aur na haani pahuncha sakate hain aur kaafir apane paalanahaar ka virodhee ban gaya hai
aur hamane aapako bas shubhasoochana dene, saavadhaan karane vaala banaakar bheja hai
aap kah den: main is[1] par tumase koee badala nahin maangata, parantu ye ki jo chaahe apane paalanahaar kee or maarg bana le

tatha aap bharosa keejie us nity jeevee par, jo marega nahin aur usakee pavitrata ka gaan keejie usakee prashansa ke saath aur aapaka paalanahaar prayaapt hai, apane bhakton ke paapon se soochit hone ko
jisane utpann kar diya aakaashon tatha dharatee ko aur jo kuchh unake beech hai, chhah dinon mein, phir (sinhaasan) par sthir ho gaya, ati dayaavaan, usakee mahima kisee gyaanee se poochho

aur jab, unase kaha jaata hai ki rahmaan (ati dayaavaan) ko sajda karo, to kahate hain ki rahmaan kya hai? kya ham (use) sajda karane lagen, jise aap aadesh den? aur (darasal) is (aamantran) ne unako aur adhik bhadaka diya
shoobh hai vah, jisane aakaash mein raashi chakr banaaye tatha usamen soory aur prakaashit chaand banaaya
vahee hai, jisane raatri tatha din ko, ek-doosare ke peechhe aate-jaate banaaya, usake lie, jo shiksha grahan karana chaahe ya krtagy hona chaahe
aur ati dayaavaan ke bhakt vo hain, jo dharatee par namrata se chalate[1] hain aur jab ashikshit (akkhad) log unase baat karate hain, to salaam karake alag[2] ho jaate hain
aur jo raatri vyateet karate hain, apane paalanahaar ke lie sajda karate hue tatha khade[1] hokar
tatha jo praarthana karate hain ki he hamaare paalanahaar! pher de hamase narak kee yaatana ko, vaastav mein, usakee yaatana chipak jaane vaalee hai
vaastav mein, vah bura aavaas aur sthaan hai
tatha jo vyay (kharch) karate samay apavyay nahin karate aur na krpan (kanjoosee) karate hain aur vah isake beech, santulit rahata hai

aur jo nahin pukaarate hain, allaah ke saath kisee doosare[1] poojy ko aur na vadh karate hain, us praan ko, jise allaah ne varjit kiya hai, parantu uchit kaaran se aur na vyabhichaar karate hain aur jo aisa karega, vah paap ka saamana karega
duganee kee jaayegee usake lie yaatana, pralay ke din tatha sada usamen apamaanit[1] hokar rahega
usake siva, jisane kshama yaachana kar lee aur eemaan laaya tatha karm kiya achchha karm, to vahee hain, badal dega allaah, jinake paapon ko puny se tatha allaah ati kshamee, dayaavaan hai
aur jisane kshama yaachana karalee aur sadaachaar kiye, to vaastav mein, vahee allaah kee or jhuk jaata hai
tatha jo mithya saakshy nahin dete aur jab vyarth ke paas se guzarate hain, to sajjan banakar guzar jaate hain
aur jab unhen shiksha dee jaaye unake paalanahaar kee aayaton dvaara, unapar nahin girate andhe tatha bahare ho[1] kar
tatha jo praarthana karate hain ki he hamaare paalanahaar! hamen hamaaree patniyon tatha santaanon se aankhon kee thandak pradaan kar aur hamen aagyaakaariyon ka agranee bana de
yahee log, uchch bhavan apane dhairy ke badale mein paayenge aur svaagat kiye jaayenge, usamen aasheervaad tatha salaam ke saath
ve usamen sadaavaasee honge. vah achchha nivaas tatha sthaan hai
(he nabee!) aap kah den ki yadi tumhaara, use pukaarana na[1] ho, to mera paalanahaar tumhaaree kya paravaah karega? tumane to jhuthala diya hai, to sheeghr hee (usaka dand) chipak jaane vaala hoga
ta, seen, meem
ye prakaashamay pustak kee aayaten hain
sambhavatah, aap apana praan[1] kho dene vaale hain ki ve eemaan laane vaale nahin hain
yadi ham chaahen, to utaar den unapar aakaash se aisee nishaanee ki unakee gardanen usake aage jhukee kee jhukee rah jaayen
aur nahin aatee hai unake paalanahaar, ati dayaavaan kee or se koee naee shiksha, parantu ve usase mukh pherane vaale ban jaate hain
to unhonne jhuthala diya! ab unake paas sheeghr hee usakee soochanaen aa jaayengee, jisaka upahaas ve kar rahe the
aur kya unhonne dharatee kee or nahin dekha ki hamane usamen ugaee hain, bahut-see pratyek prakaar kee achchhee vanaspatiyaan
nishchay hee, isamen badee nishaanee (lakshan)[1] hai. phir unamen adhiktar eemaan laane vaale nahin hain
tatha vaastav mein, aapaka paalanahaar hee prabhutvashaalee, ati dayaavaan hai
(unhen us samay kee katha sunao) jab pukaara aapake paalanahaar ne moosa ko ki jao atyaachaaree jaati[1] ke paas
firaun kee jaati ke paas, kya ve darate nahin
usane kahaah mere paalanahaar! vaastav mein, mujhe bhay hai ki ve mujhe jhuthala denge
aur sankuchit ho raha hai mera seena aur nahin chal rahee hai meree zubaan, atah vahyee bhej de haaroon kee or (bhee)
aur unaka mujhapar ek aparaadh bhee hai. atah, main darata hoon ki ve mujhe maar daalenge
allaah ne kahaah kadaapi aisa nahin hoga. tum donon hamaaree nishaaniyaan lekar jao, ham tumhaare saath sunane[1] vaale hain
to tum donon jao aur kaho ki ham vishv ke paalanahaar ke bheje hue (rasool) hain
ki too hamaare saath banee israeel ko jaane de
(firaun ne) kahaah kya hamane tera paalan nahin kiya hai, apane yahaan baalyavastha mein aur too (nahin) raha hai, hamamen apanee aayu ke kaee varsh
aur too kar gaya vah kaary,[1] jo kiya aur too krtaghanon mein se hai
(moosa ne) kahaah mainne aisa us samay kar diya, jabaki main anajaan tha
phir main tumase bhaag gaya, jab tumase bhay hua. phir pradaan kar diya mujhe, mere paalanahaar ne tatvadarshita aur mujhe bana diya rasoolon mein se
aur ye koee upakaar hai, jo too mujhe jata raha hai ki toone daas bana liya hai, israeel ke putron ko
firaun ne kahaah vishv ka paalanahaar kya hai
(moosa ne) kahaah aakaashon tatha dharatee aur usaka paalanahaar, jo kuchh donon ke beech hai, yadi tum vishvaas rakhane vaale ho
usane unase kaha, jo usake aas-paas theh kya tum sun nahin rahe ho
(musa ne) kahaah tumhaara paalanahaar tatha tumhaare poorvojon ka paalanahaar hai
(firaun ne) kahaah vaastav mein, tumhaara rasool, jo tumhaaree or bheja gaya hai, paagal hai
(moosa ne) kahaah vah, poorv tatha pashchim tatha donon ke madhy jo kuchh hai, sabaka paalanahaar hai
(firaun ne) kahaah yadi toone koee poojy bana liya mere atirikt, to tujhe bandiyon mein kar doonga
(moosa ne) kahaah kya yadyapi main le aaoon tere paas ek khulee cheez
usane kahaah too use le aa, yadi sachcha hai
phir usane apanee laathee phenk dee, to akasmaat vah ek pratyaksh ajagar ban gayee
tatha apana haath nikaala, to akasmaat vah ujjval tha, dekhane vaalon ke lie
usane apane pramukhon se kaha, jo usake paas theh vaastav mein, ye to bada daksh jaadoogar hai
ye chaahata hai ki tumhen, tumhaaree dharatee se nikaal[1] de, apane jaadoo ke bal se, to ab tum kya aadesh dete ho
sabane kahaah avasar (samay) do moosa aur usake bhaee (ke vishay) ko aur bhej do nagaron mein ekatr karane vaalon ko
ve tumhaare paas pratyek bade daksh jaadoogar ko laayen
to ekatr kar lie gaye jaadoogar ek nishchit din ke samay ke lie
tatha logon se kaha gaya ki kya tum ekatr hone vaale[1] ho
taaki ham peechhe chalen jaadoogaron ke yadi vahee prabhutvashaalee (vijayee) ho jaayen
aur jab jaadoogar aaye, to firaun se kahaah kya hamen kuchh puraskaar milega, yadi ham hee prabhutvashaalee honge
usane kahaah haan! aur tum us samay (mere) sameepavartiyon mein ho jaoge
moosa ne unase kahaah phenko, jo kuchh tum phenkane vaale ho
to unhonne phenk dee upanee rassiyaan tatha apanee laathiyaan tatha kahaah firaun ke prabhutv kee shapath! ham hee avashy prabhutvashaalee (vijayee) honge
ab moosa ne phenk dee apanee laathee, to tatkshan vah nigalane lagee (use), jo jhooth ve bana rahe the
to gir gaye sabhee jaadoogar[1] sajda karate hue
aur sabane kah diyaah ham vishv ke paalanahaar par eemaan laaye
moosa tatha haaroon ke paalanahaar par

(firaun ne) kahaah tum usaka vishvaas kar baithe, isase pahale ki main tumhen aagya doon? vaastav mein, vah tumhaara bada (guroo) hai, jisane tumhen jaadoo sikhaaya hai, to tumhen sheeghr gyaan ho jaayega, main avashy tumhaare haathon tatha pairon ko vipareet disha[1] se kaat doonga tatha tum sabhee ko phaansee de doonga
sabane kahaah koee chinta nahin, hamato apane paalanahaar heekee or phirakar jaane vaale hain
ham aasha rakhate hain ki kshama kar dega, hamaare lie, hamaara paalanahaar, hamaare paapon ko, kyonki ham sabase pahale eemaan laane vaale hain
aur hamane moosa kee or vahyee kee ki raaton-raat nikal ja mere bhakton ko lekar, tum sabaka peechha kiya jaayega
to firaun ne bhej diya nagaron mein (sena) ekatr karane[1] vaalon ko
ki ve bahut thode log hain
aur (isapar bhee) ve hamen ati krodhit kar rahe hain
aur vaastav mein, ham ek giroh hain saavadhaan rahane vaale
antatah, hamane nikaal diya unhen, baagon tatha sroton se
tatha koshon aur uttam nivaas sthaanon se
isee prakaar hua aur hamane unaka uttaraadhikaaree bana diya, israeel kee santaan ko
to unhonne unaka peechha kiya, praatah hote hee
aur jab donon girohon ne ek-doosare ko dekh liya, to moosa ke saathiyon ne kahaah hamato nishchay hee pakad lie[1] gaye
(moosa ne) kahaah kadaapi nahin, nishchay mere saath mera paalanahaar hai
to hamane moosa ko vahyee kee ki maar apanee laathee se saagar ko, akasmaat saagar phat gaya tatha pratyek bhaag, bhaaree parvat ke samaan[1] ho gaya
tatha hamane sameep kar diya usee sthaan ke, doosare giroh ko
aur mukti pradaan kar dee moosa aur usake sab saathiyon ko
phir hamane dubo diya doosaron ko
vaastav mein, isamen badee shiksha hai aur unamen se adhiktar log eemaan vaale nahin the
tatha vaastav mein, aapaka paalanahaar nishchay atyant prabhutvashaalee, dayaavaan hai
tatha aap, unhen suna den, ibraaheem ka samaachaar (bhee)
jab usane kaha, apane baap tatha apanee jaati se ki tum kya pooj rahe ho
unhonne kahaah ham moortiyon kee pooja kar rahe hain aur unheen kee seva mein lage rahate hain
usane kahaah kya ve tumhaaree sunatee hain, jab tum pukaarate ho
ya tumhen laabh pahunchaatee ya haani pahunchaatee hain
unhonne kahaah balki hamane apane poorvojon ko aisa hee karate hue paaya hai
usane kahaah kya tumane kabhee (aankh kholakar) use dekha, jise tum pooj rahe ho
tum tatha tumhaare pahale poorvaj
kyonki ye sab mere shatru hain, poore vishv ke paalanahaar ke siva
jisane mujhe paida kiya, phir vahee mujhe maarg darsha raha hai
aur jo mujhe khilaata aur pilaata hai
aur jab rogee hota hoon, to vahee mujhe svasth karata hai
tatha vahee mujhe maarega, phir[1] mujhe jeevit karega
tatha main aasha rakhata hoon ki kshama kar dega, mere lie, mere paap, pratikaar (pralay) ke din
he mere paalanahaar! pradaan kar de mujhe tatvadarshita aur mujhe sammilit kar sadaachaariyon mein।
aur mujhe sachchee khyaati pradaan kar, aagaamee logon mein
aur bana de mujhe, sukh ke svarg ka uttaraadhikaaree
tatha mere baap ko kshama kar de,[1] vaastav mein, vah kupathon mein se hai
tatha mujhe niraadar na kar, jis din sab jeevit kiye[1] jaayenge
jis din, laabh nahin dega koee dhan aur na santaan
parantu, jo allaah ke paas svachchh dil lekar aayega
aur sameep kar dee jaayegee svarg aagyaakaariyon ke lie
tatha khol dee jaayegee narak kupathon ke lie
tatha kaha jaayegaah kahaan hain ve, jinhen tum pooj rahe the
allaah ke siva, kya ve tumhaaree sahaayata karenge athava svayan apanee sahaayata kar sakate hain
phir usamen aundhe jhonk diye jaayenge ve aur sabhee kupath
aur iblees kee sena sabhee
aur ve usamen aapas mein jhagadate hue kahangeh
allaah kee shapath! vaastav mein, ham khule kupath mein the
jab ham tumhen, baraabar samajh rahe the vishv ke paalanahaar ke
aur hamen kupath nahin kiya, parantu aparaadhiyon ne
to hamaara koee abhistaavak (sifaarishee) nahin rah gaya
tatha na koee premee mitr
to yadi hamen punah sansaar mein jaana hota,[1] to ham eemaan vaalon mein ho jaate
nihsandeh, isamen badee nishaanee hai aur unamen se adhiktar eemaan laane vaale nahin hain
aur vaastav mein, aapaka paalanahaar hee ati prabhutvashaalee,[1] dayaavaan hai
nooh kee jaati ne bhee rasoolon ko jhuthalaaya
jab unase unake bhaee nooh ne kahaah kya tum (allaah se) darate nahin ho
vaastav mein, main tumhaare lie ek[1] rasool hoon
atah, tum allaah se daro aur meree baat maano
main nahin maangata isapar tumase koee paarishramik (badala), mera badala to bas sarvalok ke paalanahaar par hai
atah, tum allaah se daro aur meree aagya ka paalan karo
unhonne kahaah kya ham tujhe maan len, jabaki tera anusaran patit (neech) log[1] kar rahe hain
(nooh ne) kahaah moojhe ky gyaan ki ve kya karm karate rahe hain
unaka haisaab to bas mere paalanahaar ke oopar hai, yadi tum samajho
aur main dhutakaarane vaala[1] nahin hoon, eemaan vaalon ko
main to bas khula saavadhaan karane vaala hoon
unhonne kahaah yadi ruka nahin, he nooh! to too avashy patharaav karake maare huon mein hoga
usane kahaah mere paalanahaar! meree jaati ne mujhe jhuthala diya
atah, too nirnay kar de mere aur unake beech aur mukt kar de mujhe tatha unhen jo mere saath hain, eemaan vaalon mein se
to hamane use mukt kar diya tatha unhen jo usake saath bharee naav mein the
phir hamane dubo diya usake pashchaat, shesh logon ko
vaastav mein, isamen ek badee nishaanee (shiksha) hai tatha unamen se adhiktar eemaan laane vaale nahin
aur nishchay aapaka paalanahaar hee ati prabhutvashaalee, dayaavaan hai
jhuthala diya aad (jaati) ne (bhee) rasoolon ko
jab kaha unase, unake bhaee hood[1] neh kya tum darate nahin ho
vastutah, main tumhaare lie ek nyaasik (amaanatadaar) rasool hoon
atah, allaah se daro aur mera anupaalan karo
aur main tumase koee paarishramik (badala) nahin maangata, mera badala to bas sarvalok ke paalanahaar par hai
kyon tum bana lete ho, har oonche sthaan par ek yaadagaar bhavan, vyarth mein
tatha banaate ho, bade-bade bhavan, jaise ki tum sada rahoge
aur jabakisee ko pakadate ho, to pakadate ho, maha atyaachaaree banakar
to allaah se daro aur meree aagya ka paalan karo
tatha usase bhay rakho, jisane tumhaaree sahaayata kee hai usase, jo tum jaanate ho
usane sahaayata kee hai tumhaaree chaupaayon tatha santaan se
tatha baagon (udyaano) tatha jal sroton se
main tumapar darata hoon, bheeshan din kee yaatana se
unhonne kahaah naseehta karo ya na karo, hamapar sab samaan hai
ye baat to bas praacheen logon kee neeti[1] hai
aur ham unamen se nahin hain, jinhen yaatana dee jaayegee
antatah, unhonne hamen jhuthala diya, to hamane unhen dhvast kar diya. nishchay isamen ek badee nishaanee (shiksha) hai aur logon mein adhiktar eemaan laane vaale nahin hain
aur vaastav mein, aapaka paalanahaar hee atyant prabhutvashaalee, dayaavaan hai
jhuthala diya samood ne (bhee)[1] rasoolon ko
jab kaha unase unake bhaee saaleh neh kya tum darate nahin ho
vaastav mein, main tumhaara vishvasaneey rasool hoon
to tum allaah se daro aur mera kaha maano
tatha main nahin maangata isapar tumase koee paarishramik, mera paarishramik to bas sarvalok ke paalanahaar par hai
kya tum chhod diye jaoge usamen, jo yahaan hain nishchint rahakar
baagon tatha sroton mein
tatha kheton aur khajooron mein, jinake guchchhe ras bhare hain
tatha tumaparvaton ko taraashakar ghar banaate ho, garv karate hue
atah, allaah se daro aur mera anupaalan karo
aur paalan na karo ullanghanakaariyon ke aadesh ka
jo upadrav karate hain dharatee mein aur sudhaar nahin karate
unhonne kahaah vaastav mein, too unamen se hai, jinapar jaadoo kar diya gaya hai
too to bas hamaare samaan ek maanav hai. to koee chamatkaar le aa, yadi too sachcha hai
kahaah ye oontanee hai,[1] isake lie paanee peene ka ek din hai aur tumhaare lie paanee lene ka nishchit din hai
tatha use haath na lagaana buraee se, anyatha tumhen pakad legee ek bheeshan din kee yaatana
to unhonne vadh kar diya use, antatah, pachhataane vaale ho gaye
aur pakad liya unhen yaatana ne. vastutah, isamen badee nishaanee hai aur nahin the unamen se adhiktar eemaan vaale
aur nishchay aapaka paalanahaar hee atyant prabhutvashaalee, dayaavaan hai
jhuthala diya loot kee jaati ne (bhee) rasoolon ko
jab kaha unase unake bhaee loot neh kya tum darate nahin ho
vaastav mein, main tumhaare lie ek amaanatadaar rasool hoon
atah allaah se daro aur mera anupaalan karo
aur main tumase prashn nahin karata, isapar kisee paarishramik (badale) ka. mera badala to bas sarvalok ke paalanahaar par hai
kya tum jaate[1] ho purushon ke paas, sansaar vaasiyon mein se
tatha chhod dete ho use, jise paida kiya hai tumhaare paalanahaar ne, arthaat apanee ptaniyon ko, balki tum ek jaati ho, seema ka ullanghan karane vaalee
unhonne kahaah yadi too nahin ruka, he loot! to avashy tera bahishkaar kar diya jaayega
usane kahaah vaastav mein, main tumhaare karatoot se bahut aprasann hoon
mere paalanahaar! mujhe bacha le tatha mere parivaar ko usase, jo ve kar rahe hain
to hamane use bacha liya tatha usake sabhee parivaar ko
parantu, ek budhiya[1] ko, jo peechhe rah jaane vaalon mein thee
phir hamane vinaash kar diya doosaron ka
aur varsha kee unapar, ek ghor[1] varsha. to buree ho gayee daraaye hue logon kee varsha
vaastav mein, isamen ek badee nishaanee (shiksha) hai aur unamen se adhiktar eemaan laane vaale nahin the
aur nishchay aapaka paalanahaar hee atyant prabhutvashaalee, dayaavaan hai
jhuthala diya aiyka[1] vaalon ne rasoolon ko
jab kaha unase shoaib neh kya tum darate nahin ho
main tumhaare lie ek vishvasaneey rasool hoon
atah, allaah se daro tatha meree aagya ka paalan karo
aur main nahin maangata tumase isapar koee paarishramik, mera paarishramik to bas samast vishv ke paalanahaar par hai
tum naap-tol poora karo aur na bano kam dene vaalon mein
aur tolo seedhee taraazoo se
aur mat kam do logon ko unakee cheezen aur mat phiro dharatee mein upadrav phailaate
aur daro usase, jisane paida kiya hai tumhen tatha agale logon ko
unhonne kahaahvaastav mein, too unamen se hai, jinapar jaadoo kar diya gaya hai
aur too to bas ek purush[1] hai, hamaare samaan aur ham to tujhe jhoothon mein samajhate hain
to hamapar gira de koee khand aakaash ka, yadi too sachcha hai
usane kahaah mera paalanahaar bhalee prakaar jaanata hai use, jo kuchh tum kar rahe ho
to unhonne use jhuthala diya. antatah, pakad liya unhen chhaaya ke[1] din kee yaatana ne. vastutah, vah ek bheeshan din kee yaatana thee
nishchay hee, isamen ek badee nishaanee (shiksha) hai aur nahin the unamen adhiktar eemaan laane vaale
aur vaastav mein, aapaka paalanahaar hee atyant prabhutvashaalee, dayaavaan hai
tatha nihsandeh, ye (quraan) poore vishv ke paalanahaar ka utaara hua hai
ise lekar roohul ameen[1] utara
aapake dil par, taaki aap ho jaayen saavadhaan karane vaalon mein
khulee arabee bhaasha mein
tatha isakee charcha[1] agale rasoolon kee pustakon mein (bhee) hai
kya aur unake lie ye nishaanee nahin hai ki israeeliyon ke vidvaan[1] ise jaanate hain
aur yadi ham ise utaar dete kisee ajamee[1] par
aur vah, ise unake samaksh padhata, to ve usapar eemaan laane vaale na hote
isee prakaar, hamane ghusa diya hai is (quraan ke inkaar) ko paapiyon ke dilon mein
ve nahin eemaan laayenge usapar, jab tak dekh nahin lenge duhkhadaayee yaatana
phir, vah unapar sahasa aa jaayegee aur ve samajh bhee nahin paayenge
to kahengeh kya hamen avasar diya jaayega
to kya ve hamaaree yaatana kee jaldee macha rahe hain
(he nabee!) to kya aapane vichaar kiya ki yadi ham laabh pahunchaayen inhen varshon
phir aa jaaye unapar vah, jisakee unhen dhamakee dee ja rahee thee
to kuchh kaam nahin aayega unake, jo unhen laabh pahunchaaya jaata raha
aur hamane kisee bastee ka vinaash nahin kiya, parantu usake lie saavadhaan karane vaale the
shiksha dene ke lie aur ham atyaachaaree nahin hain
tatha nahin utare hain (is quraan) ko lekar shaitaan
aur na yogy hai unake lie aur na ve isakee shakti rakhate hain
vaastav mein, ve to (isake) sunane se bhee door[1] kar diye gaye hain
atah, aap na pukaaren allaah ke saath kisee any poojy ko, anyatha aap danditon mein ho jaayenge
aur aap saavadhaan kar den apane sameepavartee[1] sambandhiyon ko
aur jhuka den apana baahu[1] usake lie, jo aapaka anuyaayee ho, eemaan vaalon mein se
aur yadi ve aapakee avagya karen, to aap kah den ki main nirdosh hoon usase, jo tum kar rahe ho
tatha aap bharosa karen atyant prabhutvashaalee, dayaavaan par
jo dekhata hai aapako, jis samay (namaaz) mein khade hote hain
aur aapake phirane ko sajda karane[1] vaalon mein
nihsandeh, vahee sab kuchh sunane-jaanane vaala hai
kya main tum sabako bataoon ki kisapar shaitaan utarate hain
ve utarate hain, pratyek jhoothe paapee[1] par
ve pahuncha dete hain, sunee sunaee baaton ko aur unamen adhiktar jhoothe hain
aur kaviyon ka anusaran bahake hue log karate hain
kya aap nahin dekhate ki ve pratyek vaadee mein phirate[1] hain
aur aisee baat kahate hain, jo karate nahin

parantu vo (kavi), jo[1] eemaan laaye, sadaachaar kiye, allaah ka bahut smaran kiya tatha badala liya isake pashchaat ki unake oopar atyaachaar kiya gaya! tatha sheeghr hee jaan lenge, jinhonne atyaachaar kiya hai ki va kis dushparinaam kee or phirate hain
ta, seen, meem. ye quraan tatha pratyaksh pustak kee aayaten hain
maargadarshan tatha shubh soochana hai, un eemaan vaalon ke lie
jo namaaz kee sthaapana karate tatha zakaat dete hain aur vahee hain, jo antim din (paralok) par vishvaas rakhate hain
vaastav mein, jo vishvaas nahin karate paralok par, hamane shobhaneey bana diya hai unake karmon ko, isalie ve bahake ja rahe hain
yahee hain, jinake lie buree yaatana hai tatha paralok mein yahee sarvaadhik kshatigrast rahane vaale hain
aur (he nabee!) vaastav mein, aapako diya ja raha hai quraan ek tatvagy, sarvagy kee or se
(yaad karo) jab kaha[1] moosa ne apane parijanon seh mainne aag dekhee hai, main tumhaare paas koee soochana laoonga ya laoonga aag ka koee angaar, taaki tum taapo
phir jab aaya vahaan, to pukaara gayaah shubh hai vah, jo agni mein hai aur jo usake aas-paas hai aur pavitr hai allaah, sarvalok ka paalanahaar
he moosa! ye main hoon, allaah, ati prabhutvashaalee, tatvagy

aur phenk de apanee laathee, phir jab use dekha ki reng rahee hai, jaise vah koee sarp ho, to peeth pherakar bhaaga aur peechhe phirakar dekha bhee nahin. (hamane kahaah) he moosa! bhay na kar, vaastav mein, nahin bhay karate mere paas rasool
usake siva, jisane atyaachaar kiya ho, phir jisane badal liya apana karm bhalaee se buraee ke pashchaat, to nishchay, main ati kshami, dayaavaan hoon

aur daal de apana haath apanee jeb mein, vah nikalega ujjval hokar bina kisee rog ke; nau nishaaniyon mein se hai, firaun tatha usakee jaati kee or (le jaane ke lie) vaastav mein, ve ullanghanakaariyon mein hain
phir jab aayeen unake paas hamaaree nishaaniyaan, aankh kholane vaalee, to kah diya ki ye to khula jaadoo hai
tatha unhonne nakaar diya unhen, atyaachaar tatha abhimaan ke kaaran, jabaki unake dilon ne unaka vishvaas kar liya, to dekho ki kaisa raha upadraviyon ka parinaam
aur hamane pradaan kiya daavood tatha sulaimaan ko gyaan[1] aur donon ne kahaah prashansa hai, us allaah ke lie, jisane hamen pradhaanata dee apane bahut-se eemaan vaale bhakton par

aur uttaraadhikaaree hua sulaimaan daavood ka tatha usane kahaah he logo! hamen sikhaee gayee hai pakshiyon kee bolee tatha hamen pradaan kee gayee hai, sab cheez se kuchh. vaastav mein, ye pratyaksh anugrah hai
tatha ekatr kar dee gayee sulaimaan ke lie usakee senaayen; jinnon tatha maanavon aur pakshee kee aur ve vyavasthit rakhe jaate the

yahaan tak ki ve (ek baar) jab pahunche chyuntiyon kee ghaatee par, to ek chyuntee ne kahaah he chyutiyo! pravesh kar jao apane gharon mein, aisa na ho ki tumhen kuchal de sulaimaan tatha usakee senaayen aur unhen gyaan na ho

to vah (sulaimaan) muskuraakar hans pada usakee baat par aur kahaah he mere paalanahaar! mujhe kshamata pradaanakar ki main krtagy rahoon tere us puraskaar ka, jo puraskaar toone mujhapar tatha mere maata-pita par kiya hai tatha ye ki main sadaachaar karata rahoon, jisase too prasann rahe aur mujhe pravesh de apanee daya se, apane sadaachaaree bhakton mein
aur usane nireekshan kiya pakshiyon ka, to kahaah kya baat hai ki main nahin dekh raha hoon hudahud ko ya vah anupasthiton mein hai
main use kadee yaatana doonga ya use vadh kar doonga ya mere paas koee khula pramaan laaye

to kuchh adhik samay nahin beeta ki usane (aakar) kahaah mainne aisee baat ka gyaan praapt kiya hai, jo aapake gyaan mein nahin aayee hai aur main laaya hoon, aapake paas "saba"[1] se ek vishvasaneey soochana
mainne ek stree ko paaya, jo unapar raajy kar rahee hai aur use pradaan kiya gaya hai kuchh na kuchh pratyek vastu se tatha usake paas ek bada bhavy sinhaasan hai

mainne use tatha usakee jaati ko paaya ki sajda karate hain soory ko allaah ke siva aur shobhaneey bana diya hai, unake lie shaitaan ne unake karmon ko aur unhen rok diya hai supath se, atah, ve supath par nahin aate

(shaitaan ne shobhaneey bana diya hai unake lie) ki us allaah ko sajda na karen, jo nikaalata hai gupt vastu ko[1] aakaashon tatha dharatee mein tatha jaanata hai vah sab kuchh, jise tum chhupaate ho tatha jise vyakt karate ho
allaah jisake atirikt koee vandaneey nahin, jo maha sinhaasan ka svaamee hai
(sulaimaan ne) kahaah ham dekhenge ki too satyavaadee hai athava mithyaavaadiyon mein se hai
jao, ye mera patr lekar aur ise daal do unakee or, phir vaapas aa jao unake paas se, phir dekho ki ve kya uttar dete hain
usane kahaah he pramukho! meree or ek mahatvapooran patr daala gaya hai
vah sulaimaan kee or se hai aur vah atyant krpaasheel dayaavaan ke naam se (aarambh) hai
(usamen likha hai) ki tum mujhapar abhimaan na karo tatha aa jao mere paas, aagyaakaaree hokar
usane kahaah he pramukho! mujhe praamarsh do mere vishay mein, main koee nirnay karane vaala nahin hoon, jab tak tum upasthit na raho
sabane uttar diya ki ham shaktishaalee tatha bade yaadhda hain, aap svayan dekh len ki aapako kya aadesh dena hai
usane kahaah raaja jab pravesh karate hain, kisee bastee mein, to use ujaad dete hain aur usake aadaraneey vaasiyon ko apamaanit bana dete hain aur ve aisa hee karenge
aur main bhejane vaalee hoon unakee or ek upahaar, phir dekhatee hoon ki kya lekar aate hain doot

to jab vah (doot) aaya sulaimaan ke paas, to kahaah kya tum meree sahaayata dhan se karate ho? mujhe allaah ne jo diya hai, usase uttam hai, jo tumhen diya hai, balki tumheen apane upahaar se prasann ho rahe ho

vaapas ho jao unakee or, ham laayenge unake paas aisee senaen, jinaka ve saamana nahin kar sakenge aur ham avashy unhen us (bastee) se nikaal denge, apamaanit karake aur ve tuchchh (heen) hokar rahenge
sulaimaan ne kahaah he pramukho! tumamen se kaun laayega[1] usaka sinhaasan, isase pahale ki vah aa jaaye, aagyaakaara hokar
kaha ek atikaay ne, jinnon mein seh main la doonga, aapake paas use, isase poorv ki aap khade hon apane sthaan se aur isapar mujhe shakti hai, main vishvasaneey hoon

kaha usane, jisake paas pustak ka gyaan thaah main le aaoonga use, aapake paas isase pahale ki aapakee palak jhapake aur jab dekha usane use, apane paas rakha hua, to kahaah ye mere paalanahaar ka anugrah hai, taaki meree pareeksha le ki main krtagyata dikhaata hoon ya krtaghnata aur jo krtagy hota hai, vah apane laabh ke lie hota hai tatha jo krtaghn ho, to nishchay mera paalanahaar nisprh, mahaan hai
kahaah parivartan kar do usake lie usake sinhaasan mein, ham dekhenge ki vah use pahachaan jaatee hai ya unamen se ho jaatee hai, jo pahachaanate na hon
to jab vah aaee, to kaha gayaah kya aisa hee tera sinhaasan hai? usane kahaah vah to maano vahee hai aur ham to jaan gaye the isase pahale hee aur aagyaakaaree ho gaye the
aur rok rakha tha use (eemaan se) un (poojyon) ne jinakee vah ibaadat ( vandana) kar rahee thee allaah ke siva. nishchay vah kaafiron kee jaati mein se thee

usase kaha gaya ki bhavan mein pravesh kar. to jab use dekha, to use koee jalaashay (haud) samajhee aur khol deen[1] apanee donon pindaliyaan, (sulaimaan ne) kahaah ye sheeshe se nirmit bhavan hai. usane kahaah mere paalanahaar! mainne atyaachaar kiya apane praan[2] par aur (ab) main islaam laee sulaimaan ke saath allaah sarvalok ke paalanahaar ke lie
aur hamane bheja samood kee or unake bhaee saaleh ko ki tum sab ibaadat (vandana) karo allaah kee, to akasmaat ve do giroh hokar ladane lage
usane kahaah he meree jaati! kyon tum sheeghr chaahate ho buraee ko[1] bhalaee se pahale? kyon tum kshama nahin maangate allaah se, taaki tumapar daya kee jaaye
unhonne kahaah hamane apashakun liya hai tumase tatha unase, jo tere saath hain. (saaleh ne) kahaah tumhaara apashakun allaah ke paas[1] hai, balki tum logon kee pareeksha ho rahee hai
aur us nagar mein nau vyaktiyon ka ek giroh tha, jo upadrav karate the dharatee mein aur sudhaar nahin karate the

unhonne kahaah aapas mein shapath lo allaah kee ki ham avashy raatri mein chhaapa maar denge saaleh tatha usake parivaar par, phir kahenge us (saaleh) ke uttaraadhikaaree se, ham upasthit nahin the, usake parivaar ke vinaash ke samay aur nihsandeh, ham satyavaadee ( sachche) hain
aur unhonne ek shadyantr racha aur hamane bhee ek upaay kiya aur ve samajh nahin rahe the
to dekho kaisa raha unake shadyantr ka parinaam? hamane vinaash kar diya unaka tatha unakee pooree jaati ka
to ye unake ghar hain, ujaad pade hue, unake atyaachaar ke kaaran, nishchay isamen ek badee nishaanee hai, un logon ke lie, jo gyaan rakhate hain
tatha hamane bacha liya unhe, jo eemaan laaye aur (allaah) se dar rahe the
tatha loot ko (bheja), jab usane apanee jaati se kahaah kya tum kukarm kar rahe ho, jabaki tum[1] aankhen rakhate ho
kya tum purushon ke paas jaate ho, kaam vaasana kee poorti ke lie? tum log bade naasamajh ho
